channel.title: on Can Suyolcu
channel.description: Recent content in on Can Suyolcu

item.title: Project: KNN
item.description: In this project I worked with a classified data set from a company. This will be a simple project in order to classify the target class. Github link to this project

item.title: Project: Logistic Regression
item.description: In this project I worked with the Titanic Data Set from Kaggle. I tried to predict a classification- survival or deceased implementing Logistic Regression in Python for classification. Github link to this project

item.title: Project: Linear Regression
item.description: In this project I’ll be using linear regression in order to decide for a company whether to focus their efforts on a mobile app experience or a website. Github link to this project

item.title: Project: 911 Calls
item.description: This is an exercise project in order to practice my Pandas, NumPy, Seaborn and Matplotlib skills in Python. For this capstone project I will be analyzing some 911 call data from Kaggle. Github link to this project

item.title: Project: Financial Crisis
item.description: In this data project I focus on exploratory data analysis of stock prices and see how they progressed throughout the financial crisis all the way to early 2016. Github link to this project

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can follow me on these social media platforms. Platform URL LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/can-suyolcu-0a330a190/ Medium: https://medium.com/@can.suyolcu95 Github: https://github.com/CanSuyolcu
